original_text: But Jehoshabeath, the daughter of the king, took Joash the son of Ahaziah, and stole him from among the king's sons that were slain, and put him and his nurse in a bedchamber. So Jehoshabeath, the daughter of king Jehoram, the wife of Jehoiada the priest, (for she was the sister of Ahaziah,) hid him from Athaliah, so that she slew him not.
korean_text: 왕의 딸 여호사브앗이 아하시야의 아들 요아스를 왕자들이 죽임을 당하는 중에서 몰래 빼내어 그와 그의 유모를 침실에 숨겨 아달랴를 피하게 하였으므로 아달랴가 그를 죽이지 못하였더라 여호사브앗은 여호람 왕의 딸이요 아하시야의 누이요 제사장 여호야다의 아내이더라

sentences.original_text: But Jehoshabeath, daughter of king, took Joash son of Ahaziah
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 여호세바드, 왕의 딸이, 아하시야의 요아스를 데려갔는데

sentences.original_text: and stole him from among the king's sons that were slain
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 죽임당한 왕의 아들들 중에서 그를 훔쳐내어

sentences.original_text: and put him and his nurse in a bedchamber
So Jehoshabeath, daughter of king Jehoram
so that she slew him not
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그녀가 그를 죽이지 못하게 하려함이라
